scripts.start: export SLS_DEBUG=*; export ENVIRONMENT=dev; export SECRET_KEY=0ca0c6f1a981458fba337554e85196cc; serverless offline start
scripts.test: npm run docker-start; export SLS_DEBUG=*; export ENVIRONMENT=test; export SECRET_KEY=0ca0c6f1a981458fba337554e85196cc&& nyc  -r lcov -e .ts -x "./test/**/*.test.ts" jasmine-ts --config=./jasmine.json "./test/**/*.test.ts"; npm run docker-stop; npm run docker-remove-container
scripts.jasmine: export SLS_DEBUG=*; export ENVIRONMENT=test; export SECRET_KEY=0ca0c6f1a981458fba337554e85196cc&& jasmine-ts --config=./jasmine.json "./test/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.create-dev-user: export SLS_DEBUG=*; export ENVIRONMENT=dev; export SECRET_KEY=0ca0c6f1a981458fba337554e85196cc&& jasmine-ts --config=./jasmine.dev.json "./test/development/CreateDevUser.dev.ts"
scripts.docker-start: npm run dynamodb-start; npm run redis-start
scripts.docker-stop: npm run dynamodb-stop; npm run redis-stop
scripts.docker-remove-container: npm run dynamodb-remove-container; npm run redis-remove-container
